question:
You are a math expert. When you respond, respond only with the Solution of the final Problem, thinking step by step. At the end of the Solution, when you give your final answer, write it in the form 'Final Answer: \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
Given that \begin{align*}x_{1}&=211,\\ x_{2}&=375,\\ x_{3}&=420,\\ x_{4}&=523,\ \text{and}\\ x_{n}&=x_{n-1}-x_{n-2}+x_{n-3}-x_{n-4}\ \text{when}\ n\geq5, \end{align*}find the value of $x_{531}+x_{753}+x_{975}$.
ground_truth: Shifting the recurrence over by one and adding, we have: \[\begin{aligned} x_n &= x_{n-1} - x_{n-2} + x_{n-3} - x_{n-4} \\ x_{n-1} &= x_{n-2} - x_{n-3} + x_{n-4} - x_{n-5} \\ \implies x_n + x_{n-1} &= x_{n-1} - x_{n-5} \end{aligned}\]so $x_n = -x_{n-5}$ for all $n.$ In particular, $x_n = -x_{n-5} = -(-x_{n-10}) = x_{n-10},$ so the sequence repeats with period $10.$ Thus, \[\begin{aligned} x_{531} + x_{753} + x_{975} &= x_1 + x_3 + x_5 \\ &= x_1 + x_3 + (x_4-x_3+x_2-x_1) \\ &= x_2 + x_4 \\ &= 375 + 523 = \boxed{898}. \end{aligned}\]

question:
We evaluate the first four terms of the sequence. 
\begin{align*}
x_{5}&=x_{4}-x_{3}+x_{2}-x_{1}=523-420+375-211= 127,\\
x_{6}&=x_{5}-x_{4}+x_{3}-x_{2}=127-523+420-375= -301,\\
x_{7}&=x_{6}-x_{5}+x_{4}-x_{3}=-301-127+523-420= 85,\\
x_{8}&=x_{7}-x_{6}+x_{5}-x_{4}=85+301-127-523=-134.
\end{align*}
Thus, we have a pattern of the form $127,-301,85,-134,\cdots$ for terms $x_{5},x_{6},x_{7},x_{8},\cdots$. In general, for $n\geq 5$. we find that $x_{n}=(-1)^{n-3}(n-3)(12)$. Therefore, we have
\begin{align*}
x_{531}&=(-1)^{531-3}(531-3)(12)=-528\cdot 12=-6336\\
x_{753}&=(-1)^{753-3}(753-3)(12)=-750\cdot 12=-9000\\
x_{975}&=(-1)^{975-3}(975-3)(12)=-972\cdot 12=-11664.
\end{align*}
So, we have
$$x_{531}+x_{753}+x_{975}=-6336-9000+11664=\boxed{-3672}.$$
Final Answer: $\boxed{-3672}.$ I hope it is correct.
There might be an error in the solution above because of lack of understanding of the question. Please correct the error, if any, and rewrite the solution. Only output the final solution \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
ground_truth: Shifting the recurrence over by one and adding, we have: \[\begin{aligned} x_n &= x_{n-1} - x_{n-2} + x_{n-3} - x_{n-4} \\ x_{n-1} &= x_{n-2} - x_{n-3} + x_{n-4} - x_{n-5} \\ \implies x_n + x_{n-1} &= x_{n-1} - x_{n-5} \end{aligned}\]so $x_n = -x_{n-5}$ for all $n.$ In particular, $x_n = -x_{n-5} = -(-x_{n-10}) = x_{n-10},$ so the sequence repeats with period $10.$ Thus, \[\begin{aligned} x_{531} + x_{753} + x_{975} &= x_1 + x_3 + x_5 \\ &= x_1 + x_3 + (x_4-x_3+x_2-x_1) \\ &= x_2 + x_4 \\ &= 375 + 523 = \boxed{898}. \end{aligned}\]
